abstract.p: List of summer reading assignments from several Westchester County, NY, school districts (M)

block.p: ADULTS may envy their children for the length of their summer vacation, but they might not want to trade reading lists.

For a grownup, the summer book bag may contain nothing more challenging than the latest Danielle Steele or John Grisham. For children -- well, they will very likely be reading what their schools tell them to. Sometimes it's a requirement, sometimes just a suggestion.
ADULTS may envy their children for the length of their summer vacation, but they might not want to trade reading lists.

For a grownup, the summer book bag may contain nothing more challenging than the latest Danielle Steele or John Grisham. For children -- well, they will very likely be reading what their schools tell them to. Sometimes it's a requirement, sometimes just a suggestion.
Here are the summer assignments from several districts. Keep in mind that, since most schools don't let out for nearly a month, there may be modifications to these lists.
